volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Avocado Picking
volunteers.subtitle: Avocado Picking 'Heart of the Galilee' Association
volunteers.description: Help us harvest delicious avocados in the scenic Upper Galilee region. Join us for a fun and rewarding morning of picking avocados straight from the trees. No prior experience is required, and all equipment will be provided. Come and enjoy the beauty of nature while contributing to the local agricultural community.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Grape Harvesting
volunteers.subtitle: Vineyard Harvesting Experience
volunteers.description: Join us for a unique grape harvesting experience at our vineyard in the picturesque Upper Galilee region. You'll learn about grape varieties, vineyard management, and get hands-on experience picking grapes. Suitable for all skill levels. Come prepared for a fulfilling morning of teamwork and grape-filled fun.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Olive Harvesting
volunteers.subtitle: Olives from the Holy Land
volunteers.description: Experience the ancient tradition of olive harvesting in the heart of the Galilee. Join us for a morning of picking olives from our historic olive groves. Learn about olive oil production, enjoy the serene countryside, and make a difference in preserving local heritage. No prior experience needed.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Citrus Fruit Picking
volunteers.subtitle: Harvest the Best Citrus Fruits
volunteers.description: Join us for a morning of picking juicy citrus fruits at our orchard. Experience the freshness and sweetness of locally grown oranges, lemons, and grapefruits. Learn about the cultivation of citrus trees and contribute to supporting sustainable farming practices. All necessary equipment will be provided.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Herb Garden Maintenance
volunteers.subtitle: Caring for Nature's Medicinal Herbs
volunteers.description: Help us maintain our beautiful herb garden and learn about the medicinal properties of various herbs. Spend a morning surrounded by fragrant basil, lavender, rosemary, and more. No prior gardening experience necessary. Get hands-on experience while contributing to the preservation of traditional herbal knowledge.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Mushroom Harvesting
volunteers.subtitle: Delve into the World of Mushrooms
volunteers.description: Join us for an exciting morning of mushroom harvesting at our organic farm. Learn about different mushroom varieties, cultivation techniques, and the role of mushrooms in sustainable agriculture. Discover the wonders of mycology and contribute to the production of fresh, locally grown mushrooms.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Grapevine Pruning
volunteers.subtitle: Learn the Art of Grapevine Pruning
volunteers.description: Join us for a morning of grapevine pruning in the scenic Golan Heights. Discover the techniques behind shaping and maintaining healthy grapevines. Learn from experienced vineyard workers and contribute to the quality of future grape harvests. No prior knowledge required; all tools will be provided.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Tomato Harvesting
volunteers.subtitle: Pluck Ripe Tomatoes Straight from the Vine
volunteers.description: Experience the joy of harvesting ripe tomatoes at our organic farm in the fertile Jezreel Valley. Spend a morning picking delicious and sun-ripened tomatoes. Learn about organic farming practices, the importance of sustainable agriculture, and contribute to providing fresh, healthy produce to local communities.

volunteers.subject: agriculture
volunteers.title: Apple Orchard Care
volunteers.subtitle: Nurture Apple Trees in the Carmel Mountains
volunteers.description: Join us for a morning of tending to apple trees in the beautiful Carmel Mountains. Learn about proper orchard care, including pruning, watering, and pest control. Contribute to the growth of healthy apple trees and the preservation of an important agricultural tradition. Suitable for nature lovers of all ages.
